d1_flags: 1. goto C66353 if FRANKYSTEIN_MKII_DEFEATED is set
1. goto C66392 if TEMP_2 is set
1. goto C66469 if FRANK_DEFEATED is set
1. goto C665E7 if TEMP_4 is set
d1_text:
Npc0146:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TEMP_2 L_C66392]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG FRANKYSTEIN_MKII_DEFEATED L_C66353]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG FRANK_DEFEATED L_C66469]
ï¿½.....[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...I'm Frank.[PAUSE 30]  You are?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½[PAUSE 30]C'mon,[PAUSE 15] can't you at least say your name?[WAIT][GOSUB L_C683FB]
[GOTO_IF_TRUE L_C683DE]
[STOP_MUSIC]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½ï¿½Fail-proofï¿½ Frank can't be beaten.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Puff,[PAUSE 10] puff,[PAUSE 10] puff[LINE_BREAK]
  And this is[PAUSE 15][LINE_BREAK]
  ï¿½Frankystein Mark II.ï¿½[WAIT][SET_FLAG FRANK_DEFEATED]
[GOSUB L_C68402]
[GOTO_IF_TRUE L_C683DE]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 202 635]
[PAUSE 30][SET_FLAG FRANKYSTEIN_MKII_DEFEATED]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
; $C66175
L_C66175:
[START_LINE]
ï¿½...This is my first defeat.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½ï¿½Fail-proofï¿½ Frank is now just ï¿½failureï¿½ Frank.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I know you've been asking around,[PAUSE 15] so I'll tell you about Giant Step.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It...[LINE_BREAK]
  seems...[LINE_BREAK]
  to be quite a powerful spot.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Some kind of special power is stored there[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½that allows certain people to perform wondrous feats.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½However... a monster sucked up all the energy at that spot.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's difficult to get to Giant Step.[PAUSE 20]  That's all I know...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I suggest you collect more information on your own.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The entrance to the path leading to Giant Step is[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½behind the touring entertainers' shack.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Pirkle,[PAUSE 15] the Mayor of Onett,[PAUSE 15] has a key to the shack.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½[PRINT_NAME NESS],[PAUSE 15] you've become stronger than I![PAUSE 20]  Your adventure is just beginning...[HALT][SET_FLAG FRANKYSTEIN_MKII_DEFEATED]
[SET_FLAG SHARK_AT_ARCADE_UPSTAIRS_DEFEATED]
[SET_FLAG SHARK_OUTSIDE_ARCADE_1_DEFEATED]
[SET_FLAG SHARK_OUTSIDE_ARCADE_2_DEFEATED]
[CLR_FLAG SHARK_AT_ARCADE_ABSENT]
[SET_FLAG TEMP_2]
[END]
